comment: Batch 15, bottle 123, 86 proof. A bit of sharpie marker on the nose, and some sour fruit. A hint of clove. On the palate, smooth, tastes like honey. Not much of the young notes I expect from craft distilleries these days, thankfully. Palate is much better than the nose. After the wave of honey, there's lingering spice. Not complex, but it's pleasant and very drinkable. 4/18/2020
Nice light vanilla, with a touch of caramel.
faint vanilla and carmel very smooth with a light finish.
